AT.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
AT.description: Eine der beliebtesten Spielserien aus Nintendos langer Geschichte hat jetzt ein prächtiges Comeback in spektakulärem 3D! Pit alias Kid Icarus kehrt in einem neuen Spiel zurück, das speziell für das Nintendo 3DS-System entworfen wurde. „Kid Icarus: Uprising“ ist ein rasantes, actionreiches Spiel, das Schusswechsel in der Luft und am Boden mit einem umfangreichen Einzelspieler-Abenteuer sowie der Möglichkeit, mit Freunden lokal und online zu spielen, verbindet. Du kannst die AR-Karten und das Nintendo 3DS™-Aufsteller-Pack separat erwerben – beide sind ursprünglich zusammen mit der Einzelhandelsversion von Kid Icarus™: Uprising erschienen. So hast du die Möglichkeit, auch längere Spielsitzungen komfortabel und angenehm zu gestalten. Dieses Angebot ist in ausgewählten Ländern verfügbar.

AU.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
AU.description: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. Please note: this software does not include the AR Cards or Nintendo 3DS stand included with the packaged version. These items are not available for individual purchase.

BG.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
BG.description: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. To keep the experience comfortable and enjoyable for long gaming sessions, you can purchase the AR Cards and the Nintendo 3DS™ Stand pack separately, which were originally bundled with the retail version of Kid Icarus™: Uprising. This offer is available in selected countries.

BE.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
BE.description: Une des franchises les plus appréciées de la longue histoire de Nintendo fait son retour en 3D spectaculaire. Pit de Kid Icarus revient dans un nouveau jeu conçu spécialement pour la console Nintendo 3DS. Dans Kid Icarus: Uprising, découvrez l'action rythmée des combats aériens et des combats au sol, dans une aventure en solo très vaste avec la possibilité de jouer avec vos amis en local et en ligne. Afin de rendre vos longues sessions de jeu plus agréables, vous pouvez acheter séparément le support Nintendo 3DS™ et les cartes de réalité augmentée qui étaient inclus dans la version boîte de Kid Icarus™: Uprising. Cette offre est disponible dans certains pays.

ES.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
ES.description: ¡Una de las franquicias más aclamadas en la larga historia de Nintendo vuelve por sus fueros en tres espectaculares dimensiones! Pit de Kid Icarus vuelve en un título diseñado específicamente para la consola Nintendo 3DS. Kid Icarus: Uprising es un shooter 3D que combina acción y velocidad por tierra y aire. El título ofrece una gran aventura en el modo para un jugador y la opción de disfrutar del mismo con amigos en modo local y en línea. Si quieres disfrutar con total comodidad incluso de las sesiones de juego más largas, puedes adquirir por separado en determinados países el pack que incluye las tarjetas RA y el soporte de Nintendo 3DS™. Este pack se vendía inicialmente junto con la versión disponible en tiendas de Kid Icarus™: Uprising.

IT.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
IT.description: Uno dei franchise più amati della lunga storia di Nintendo fa il suo spettacolare ritorno sulle scene in 3D! Kid Icarus ritorna in un nuovo gioco sviluppato appositamente per la console Nintendo 3DS. Kid Icarus: Uprising è un frenetico gioco d'azione che combina combattimenti a terra e in volo, caratterizzato da un'estesa avventura in singolo e dalla possibilità di giocare con amici in connessione locale o online. Per goderti in tutta comodità anche le sessioni di gioco più lunghe, puoi acquistare separatamente le carte RA e il supporto per Nintendo 3DS™ inizialmente inclusi nella versione di Kid Icarus™: Uprising disponibile nei negozi. L'offerta è valida solo in alcuni paesi.

NL.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
NL.description: Een van de meest geliefde personages uit Nintendo's aanzienlijke geschiedenis keert terug in spectaculair 3D! Pit uit de 8-bit-klassieker Kid Icarus is terug in een nieuw spel dat speciaal is ontwikkeld voor Nintendo 3DS. Kid Icarus: Uprising draait om razendsnelle schietactie, zowel op de grond als in de lucht, ondersteund door elegante, intuïtieve en gestroomlijnde besturing. Het spel bevat een enorm avontuur voor een enkele speler en de mogelijkheid om lokaal en online met vrienden te spelen. Om lange speelsessies nog leuker en comfortabeler te maken kun je het pakket met de AR-kaarten en de Nintendo 3DS™-standaard, dat oorspronkelijk werd geleverd bij de winkelversie van Kid Icarus™: Uprising, apart aanschaffen. Dit aanbod geldt in bepaalde landen.

NZ.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
NZ.description: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. Please note: this software does not include the AR Cards or Nintendo 3DS stand included with the packaged version. These items are not available for individual purchase.

PL.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
PL.description: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. This offer is available in selected countries.

PT.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
PT.description: Uma das marcas mais amadas da longa história da Nintendo faz um glorioso regresso, desta feita em 3D! O popular Kid Icarus regressa num novo jogo concebido especificamente para a consola Nintendo 3DS. Kid Icarus: Uprising é um título repleto de ação cujos disparos, aéreos ou terrestres, poderás controlar de forma simples e intuitiva. Contém uma enorme aventura para jogador único assim como a opção de jogar com amigos localmente e online. Para que até as longas sessões de jogo sejam confortáveis e divertidas, é possível adquirir separadamente, em alguns países, os cartões RA e o suporte da Nintendo 3DS™ que tinham sido incluídos na versão de retalho de Kid Icarus™: Uprising.

RU.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Одна из самых давних и любимых франшиз в истории Nintendo снова на экранах в режиме 3D! Славный Kid Icarus возвращается в новой игре, разработанной специально для Nintendo 3DS. Kid Icarus: Uprising представляет собой динамичный шутер с увлекательным приключением в режиме одиночной игры и возможностью играть вместе с друзьями в режиме онлайн или по локальному соединению.

movies.name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising: полная версия трейлера
